sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import './TopNews.css' var pageControl = [0,1,2,3,4]; function nextPage() { pageControl = pageControl.map(element => element + 5) } function previousPage() { if(pageControl[0] === 0){ alert("This is the first page.") } else { pageControl = pageControl.map(element => element - 5) } } const LocalNews = (props) => { return (

Latest News on COVID-19

News is powered by newsapi.org
{props.newsData[pageControl[0]].title} Author: {props.newsData[pageControl[0]].author}
{props.newsData[pageControl[0]].description}
{props.newsData[pageControl[1]].title} Author: {props.newsData[pageControl[1]].author}
{props.newsData[pageControl[1]].description}
{props.newsData[pageControl[2]].title} Author: {props.newsData[pageControl[2]].author}
{props.newsData[pageControl[2]].description}
{props.newsData[pageControl[3]].title} Author: {props.newsData[pageControl[3]].author}
{props.newsData[pageControl[3]].description}
{props.newsData[pageControl[4]].title} Author: {props.newsData[pageControl[4]].author}
{props.newsData[pageControl[4]].description}
) } export default LocalNews
